entry.title: 54" x 108" Hunter Emerald Green 10 Mil Thick Chevron Waterproof Tablecloth PVC Rectangle Disposable Tablecloth
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_2250
Type: Tablecloths
Price: 1.98 - 21.86 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 1 Tablecloth
Material: Plastic
Color: Hunter Emerald Green | White
Product Length: 108 inches
Product Width: 54 inches
Product Thickness: 10 mil
Design: Chevron
Shape: Rectangle
Reusable: Yes
Seamless: Yes
Durable: Yes
Waterproof: Yes
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Durability of high quality PVC (Polyvinyl Chloride) material is combined with the jazzy appeal of chic chevron design in these Waterproof Tablecloth to give you an absolute luxury for your upcoming catering or culinary event.  Perfect for setting an elegant table at your picnic, banquets, holiday parties, or for casual eateries, our heavy duty plastic vinyl tablecloths are thick enough to give your tables all the protection required. No need to spend your quality time and efforts on cleaning and ironing the tablecloths. These plastic table cloths are an ideal choice for outdoor/ indoor parties, birthday bashes, banquets and other culinary events. From the huge array of exciting colors available, choose the color that complements your event's theme.

Multi-Use

These table covers are an ideal choice for any occasions. Speed up cleaning so you can turn tables faster! You'll never have to waste time and money laundering linen table covers again.

Decorative

Aside from its elegance, it effectively repels water, making it ideal for protecting tables from spills. You'll never have to worry about juice or wine spilling across the table again.

Durable

Our Waterproof Tablecloth is made from high quality vinyl which gives you superior strength and durability and also provides the convenience of disposability that your events require.

 

Additional Information:

  • Quantity: 1 Tablecloth
  • Material: Plastic
  • Color: Hunter Emerald Green | White
  • Product Length: 108 inches
  • Product Width: 54 inches
  • Product Thickness: 10 mil
  • Uses: Wedding, Birthday, Party, Event, Banquet, Restaurant Decoration
  • How to Care: Wipe clean with damp cloth

Plastic table skirt clips - adjustable sizing.
Clips has Velcro on the back to attach on the table skirts easily.
Size: fits 0.6" - 0.8" thickness (1.5 - 2 cm)
Each order will contain a package of 12 clips.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Table skirting not only hides those ugly, dreary table legs, but also transforms an ordinary party table into an elegant tablescape. With tulle, organza, satin, taffeta, or polyester table skirts dressing your party tables up lavishly, your party decoration will surpass the most sophisticated of celebrations. Let these pretty table skirts be glamming your party ambiance up for longer hours and many more festivities by using our durable plastic table skirt clips. These premium quality plastic clips will hold your table skirts perfectly without any risk of breaking or cracking. The Velcro on the back of clips helps in easy attachment and excellent grip retention.

Additional Information:

  • Plastic table skirt clips - adjustable sizing.
  • Clips has Velcro on the back to attach on the table skirts easily. 
  • Size: fits 0.6" - 0.8" thickness (1.5 - 2 cm)
  • Each order will contain a package of 12 clips.
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration
